title: 75: 47 Vaccines - Racing Against Time
description:
Consumers and the health-care industry haven't always gotten along. There are battles about pricing, the availability of drugs, and huge profits arguably at the expense of human health. But coronavirus has put the tension on hold. Perhaps more than ever before, doctors, public health officials, patients, and Big Pharma are working toward the same goal: stopping the spread of Covid-19. This week on The Readback, Alex Eule talks to Barron's healthcare reporter Josh Nathan-Kazis
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
